name: Item-wise Purchase History
query:
select
    po_item.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
	po_item.item_name as "Item Name::120",
    po_item.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:120",
    item.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group:Link/Item Group:120",
	po_item.description as "Description::150",
	po_item.qty as "Qty:Float:80",
	po_item.uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:80",
	po_item.base_rate as "Rate:Currency:120",
	po_item.base_amount as "Amount:Currency:120",
	po.name as "Purchase Order:Link/Purchase Order:130",
	po.transaction_date as "Transaction Date:Date:110",
	po.supplier as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:130",
        sup.supplier_name as "Supplier Name::150",
	ifnull(po_item.received_qty, 0) as "Received Qty:Float:100",
	po_item.cost_center as "Cost Center:Link/Cost Center:220"
from
	`tabPurchase Order` po, `tabPurchase Order Item` po_item, `tabSupplier` sup, `tabItem` item
where
	po.name = po_item.parent and po.supplier = sup.name and item.name = po_item.item_code and po.docstatus = 1
	and po.company=%(company)s
	and po.transaction_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
order by po.name desc
